name: Soft Drinks Online Quiz | Food & Drink | 10 Questions

questions.text: This bitter, acquired-taste soft drink, made since 1884, is mainly distributed only in New England.
In the 1980s, what soft drink changed its formula, then changed it back to its original formula after the new one bombed?
What is the stimulant that many soft drinks have?
What drink was the favorite of Lt. Kaffee (Tom Cruise) in the movie "A Few Good Men"?
questions.explanation:
Yoo-Hoo.

	When he invited the other lawyers over to his apartment to work, he told them, "The only thing I have to eat is Yoo-Hoo and Cocoa Puffs, so if you want anything else bring it with you."

questions.text: What gas is dissolved in certain soft drinks to make them fizzy?
Most root beers don't have the stimulant mentioned in question 3. Which of these brands does?
What is *not* a name that is used in the US for soft drinks?
In 'Back To The Future', Marty (Michael J. Fox) tries to order two different soft drinks unsuccessfully. Name one of them.
What part of soft drink cans are rumored to be worth $1 each towards dialysis?
questions.explanation:
Pull Tab.

	Note: THIS IS AN URBAN LEGEND! They are only worth recycle value no matter how worthy the cause.

questions.text: What makes most brown soft drinks brown?
